sentences.en: ...his niece, the daughter of his eldest sister.
Framton turned toward his niece with a look of sympathetic comprehension.
sentences.cn: 福拉姆敦转过脸向他侄女投以心照不宣的眼色.

sentences.en: He adopts his niece as his heiress.
sentences.cn: 他指定他的侄女为继承人.

sentences.en: He looked affectionately at his niece.
sentences.cn: 他慈爱地看着他的侄女。

sentences.en: his niece, the daughter of his eldest sister
sentences.cn: 他的外甥女，他大姐的女儿

sentences.en: In the course of his brief visit, he quite forgot to ask after his niece.
sentences.cn: 在这番短促的拜访中, 他完全忘记打听一下他侄女的情况.

sentences.en: Jastrow glanced doubtfully from the Palestinian to his niece.
sentences.cn: 杰斯特罗满腹狐疑地看看巴勒斯坦人,又看看他的的侄女.

sentences.en: Jastrow knit his brow fiercely at his niece.
sentences.cn: 杰斯特罗狠狠地对他侄女皱起眉头.

sentences.en: Marilyn, you're going to design my niece's dress.
sentences.cn: Marilyn现在就开始设计我侄女的结婚礼服.

sentences.en: Miss Ley could not help asking herself if he really loved her niece.
sentences.cn: 莱伊小姐不好问他是不是真正爱她的侄女.

sentences.en: My niece has practiced ballet for six years.
sentences.cn: 我侄女已练了六年芭蕾舞了.

sentences.en: My niece was left in my trust for the weekend.
sentences.cn: 我受托周末照顾我的外甥女.

sentences.en: She kept her niece for a week while her sister was ill.
sentences.cn: 她姐姐生病时她照顾一周她侄女.

sentences.en: She thought it brave of her niece even to have dressed.
sentences.cn: 她认为她的侄女很顽强,因为她甚至梳妆打扮好了.

sentences.en: The massa's eyes drank in the wet - eyed earnestness of his beloved niece.
sentences.cn: 老爷如醉如痴地欣赏他心爱的侄女那种双眼饱含泪水的认真神情.

sentences.en: This year all the apples are all red. My niece and nephew are going out this morning with step-ladders to pick some.
sentences.cn: 今年所有的苹果都红了。我侄女和侄子今天早晨准备带上梯子去摘一些。

sentences.en: You must teach my niece to take things quietly.
sentences.cn: 你要多多开导我的侄女,让她知道,立身处世以温和为本.

trans.tran_en: the daughter of your brother or sister, or the daughter of your wife’s or husband’s brother or sister
